homepage.allInOneTesting.desc.message: Write unit tests, integration tests, e2e tests with the one API.

homepage.realRuntime.desc.message: Freedom to choose browser or node.js to test the code instead of both in a single runtime.

homepage.snapshots.desc.message: You can do some javascript value snapshots, image snapshots, page screenshots, area screenshots.

homepage.outOfBox.desc.message: TypeScript, Decorators, ESM and JSX are all out of the box.
